component.description: ContextMenu provides an overlay menu displayed on mouse right-click event.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: for
attribute.description: Id of the component to attach to.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main container element.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container element.

attribute.name: model
attribute.description: Menu model instance to create menu programmatically.

attribute.name: nodeType
attribute.description: Type of tree nodes to get attached.

attribute.name: event
attribute.description: Event to bind the contextmenu default is right click.

attribute.name: beforeShow
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute before context menu is shown.
